newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 25.75 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 25.75 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 28-day interbank interest rate fell by 0.125 percentage points to 25.75 percent on Friday, from 25.875 percent on Thursday, Banco de Mexicosaid.
The TIIE is a market-weighted average interbank rate.
